snippet: Legislation legalizing same-sex marriage in Illinois is expected to come up in a State Senate committee meeting Tuesday and could see a floor vote on Feb. 14, said its sponsor, Senator Heather Steans, a Chicago Democrat.
abstract: Legislation legalizing same-sex marriage in Illinois is expected to come up in State Senate committee meeting and could see floor vote on Valentine's Day.
lead_paragraph: Legislation legalizing same-sex marriage in Illinois is expected to come up in a State Senate committee meeting Tuesday and could see a floor vote on Feb. 14, said its sponsor, Senator Heather Steans, a Chicago Democrat.

headline.seo: Illinois: Gay Marriage Vote Very Likely
headline.main: Illinois: Gay Marriage Vote Very Likely

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
